TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(object sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartCancelEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartCancelEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartCancelEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartCancelEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartCancelEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartCancelEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartCancelEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento , o de una clase .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event, event, or event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método especificado en el delegado se llama cuando un eventos, evento, o provoca el evento.The method specified in the delegate is called when a event, event, or event is raised. Los desarrolladores de páginas pueden proporcionar controladores personalizados para los eventos de elementos Web agregando un `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` atributo, `OnWebPartClosing` atributo, o `OnWebPartDeleting` atributo a la `` los elementos de una página y asignarle un nombre de método personalizado para el atributo.Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. También se puede asignar un controlador personalizado mediante programación.A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. Para obtener más información acerca de cómo suscribirse a un evento, vea [Cómo: provocar y consumir eventos](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md).For more information about how to subscribe to an event, see [How to: Raise and Consume Events](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-raise-and-consume-events.md).
